message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'd like to propose a 60-40 split in my favor.  We both get more this way with the inflation.  Let's make a deal!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still want a bigger share
Let's split it evenly this time. Inflation is hitting us both, so a 50-50 split is the fairest way to go.
